Articles.Content:
Wishing you all, no matter where you're from, a happy Thanksgiving. A day for expressing thanks for all we've received, for all kinds of things ... KSP included. I'm thankful for family and friends, and for the bounty and trials this past year has provided me; It has made me stronger, better.

What are you thankful for?
I'm thankful for the great opportunities presented for the next years of my life in my advancement towards spaceflight.
I'm thankful for my family, my friends, and the internet, since it allows me to write this.
Right now I'm thankful for Rolaids.

a quasi religious holiday stolen from pagans where 2 of the 7 deadly sins are committed. i generally despise holidays because they disrupt my status quo. the only think im thankfull for is that its over.
Wait is Thanksgiving already over? I don't celebrate it soooo...

My thanksgiving was six weeks ago, but if any Washingtonians have too much leftover turkey, stuffing, or yams, they can punt it over the 49th parallel to me. 

Atthe time, I was thankful to just have two days off...
